comment: Dr. Amir, (what he likes to be called) wants you to pass. the low ratings are coming from his MTRE 1000 class when understand those expectations. By rights, I should have gotten an F in 4001, all the tests are open book. The only thing determining whether you pass is whether you understand the material. And it's not that hard. It's basicaly fun ODE

comment: He teaches straight out of the textbook. The slides in lecture is literally the textbook copied. He does examples already solved in the textbook during lecture and his homework is from textbook. So if you follow along with the textbook and solve problems from it you should pass easily. Con: He takes attendance and takes away point for absence.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: One of the most useless professors I've had, an absolute waste of my tuition. His lectures are meaningless and have nothing to do with the actual MTRE curriculum. Usually late, harsh grader for some people, his assignments are busy work and are almost always due at random times (such as at 2:06 AM) without warning. A complete waste of my time.
